mapper.sql: select v.id, v.user_id, v.tutor_id, v.money, v.weigh, v.status, v.create_time, v.create_by, v.update_time, v.update_by, v.remarks, v.delete_flag, v.vote_type, m.id m_id, m.username m_username, m.nickname m_nickname, -- m.password m_password, m.salt m_salt, m.mobile m_mobile, -- m.avatar m_avatar, m.successions m_successions, m.max_successions m_max_successions, m.prev_time m_prev_time, m.login_time m_login_time, -- m.login_ip m_login_ip, -- m.payment_code m_payment_code, -- m.join_ip m_join_ip, m.join_time m_join_time, m.create_time m_create_time, m.update_time m_update_time, m.status m_status, m.balance m_balance, m.superior_name m_superior_name, m.superior_code m_superior_code, m.superior_id m_superior_id, m.institution_number m_institution_number, m.daili_id m_daili_id, m.jingzhijiaoyi m_jingzhijiaoyi, m.is_pz m_is_pz, m.is_dz m_is_dz, m.is_ps m_is_ps, m.is_sg m_is_sg, m.is_zs m_is_zs, m.is_qc m_is_qc, m.is_qh m_is_qh, m.is_inform m_is_inform, m.freeze_profit m_freeze_profit, m.weiyima m_weiyima, m.name m_name, m.id_card m_id_card, m.submit_auth_time m_submit_auth_time, m.auth_time m_auth_time, m.is_auth m_is_auth, m.auth_reject_reason m_auth_reject_reason, m.auth_reject_time m_auth_reject_time, m.deposit_bank m_deposit_bank, m.khzhihang m_khzhihang, m.account_name m_account_name, m.account m_account, -- m.card_image m_card_image, m.binding_time m_binding_time, m.unbind_time m_unbind_time, m.delete_flag m_delete_flag, m.bank_card_auth m_bank_card_auth, m.withdraw_switch m_withdraw_switch, t.id t_id, t.tutor_image t_tutor_image, t.tutor_name t_tutor_name, t.tutor_id_num t_tutor_id_num, t.tutor_intro t_tutor_intro, t.vote_nums t_vote_nums, t.money t_money, t.weigh t_weigh, t.status t_status, t.create_time t_create_time, t.create_by t_create_by, t.update_time t_update_time, t.update_by t_update_by, t.remarks t_remarks, t.delete_flag t_delete_flag from fa_tutor_vote v left join fa_member m on v.user_id = m.id left join fa_tutor_list t on v.tutor_id = t.id
mapper.insert:
insert into fa_tutor_vote
user_id, tutor_id, money, weigh, status, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remarks, delete_flag, vote_type,
#{userId}, #{tutorId}, #{money}, #{weigh}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy}, #{remarks}, #{deleteFlag}, #{voteType},
mapper.delete: update fa_tutor_vote set delete_flag = 1 where id = #{id}

update fa_tutor_vote set delete_flag = 1 where id in
#{id}
